languages.text: "Опасно держать такого пленника в своем доме. Вдруг он выберется из клетки и придет за тобой?"
"Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"
languages.original_text: "Опасно держать такого пленника в своем доме. Вдруг он выберется из клетки и придет за тобой?"

traits.locale_text: "Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your own abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"
"Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your own abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"
[Growl menacingly] "If you will not release him, I shall free him by force!"
"Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"
"Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"
"Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"
"Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"

languages.text: « Il me semble bien dangereux de détenir un tel prisonnier dans votre demeure. Ne craignez-vous pas qu'il s'échappe et tente de vous tuer ? »
languages.original_text: "Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"

traits.locale_text: « Il me semble bien dangereux de détenir un tel prisonnier dans votre demeure. Ne craignez-vous pas qu'il s'échappe et tente de vous tuer ? »

languages.text: “把这样的囚犯关在你的住处实在是太危险了。万一他从笼子里逃出来，打算拧掉你的脑袋呢？”
languages.original_text: "Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"

traits.locale_text: [气势汹汹地咆哮]“如果你不放人，我就要来硬的了！”

languages.text: "Es ist gewiss gefährlich, einen solchen Gefangenen zu beherbergen. Was, wenn er entkommt und sich Euren Kopf holt?"
languages.original_text: "Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"

traits.locale_text: [Bedrohlich knurren] "Wenn Ihr ihn nicht freilasst, befreie ich ihn mit Gewalt!"

languages.text: «Debe de ser peligroso tener esta clase de prisioneros. ¿Y si se escapa y viene a por tu cabeza?».
languages.original_text: "Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"

traits.locale_text: [Vociferar de forma amenazante] «Si no lo sueltas, ¡lo liberaré a la fuerza!».

languages.text: 「そのような囚人を家に閉じ込めておくのは危険だ。もし彼が脱出し、首をかき切りに来たらどうする？」
languages.original_text: "Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"

traits.locale_text: 「そのような囚人を家に閉じ込めておくのは危険だ。もし彼が脱出し、首をかき切りに来たらどうする？」

languages.text: "Böyle bir mahkûmu meskeninde tutman şüphesiz ki tehlikelidir. Ya kaçar da senin peşine düşerse?"
languages.original_text: "Surely it is dangerous to keep such a prisoner in your abode. What if he escapes and comes for your head?"

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir mahkûmu meskeninde tutman şüphesiz ki tehlikelidir. Ya kaçar da senin peşine düşerse?"
